dcterms:creator: G. Tür
D. Hakkani-Tür
K. Oflazer
dcterms:description: A collection of articles from the national newspaper Milliyet, covering a period between 1 January 1997 and 12 September 1998. The dataset contains Turkish sentences tagged with BIO2 scheme in CoNNL format and morphological analyses of all sentence tokens.
dcterms:title: Turkish NER Dataset
